actionCalls.name: Opportunity_Closed_Won_Cloud_Email_Cancellation
actionCalls.label: Opportunity Closed Won Cloud Email Cancellation

actionCalls.name: Opportunity_Closed_Won_Finance_Catch_All_Notification
actionCalls.label: Opportunity Closed Won Finance Catch All Notification

actionCalls.name: Opportunity_Closed_Won_Legal_Consulting_Services
actionCalls.label: Opportunity Closed Won - Legal - Consulting Services

decisions.name: Create_PCs_for_Closed_Won_Opportunities
decisions.label: Create PCs for Closed Won Opportunities

rules.name: Create_Product_Customer
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND 2 AND 4) OR (2 AND 3 AND 4) OR (4 AND 5)
rules.label: Create Product Customer

decisions.name: Does_PC_exist_for_this_product_line
decisions.label: Does PC exist for this product line

rules.name: TRUE_Status_Pending_Closure_Services
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND (2 OR 6) AND 3 AND 4) OR (1 AND (2 or 6) AND 5)
rules.label: TRUE_Status Pending Closure Services

rules.name: TRUE_1_Sales_Notification_for_greater_than_20K
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 8 OR 9) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 10
rules.label: TRUE_1. Sales Notification for greater than 20K

decisions.name: X2_Sales_Notification_for_equal_or_less_than_20K
decisions.label: 2. Sales Notification for equal or less than 20K

rules.name: TRUE_2_Sales_Notification_for_equal_or_less_than_20K
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 8 OR 9) AND 4 AND 5 AND 6 AND 7 AND 10
rules.label: TRUE_2. Sales Notification for equal or less than 20K

formulas.name: ChampiongotpopulatedFormula
formula_TRUE_myRule_32
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), ISCHANGED({!$Record.StageName }), {!$Record.Sale_Category__c ="Churn"}, NOT(ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"ACV Recovery/Partial ACV Reinstatement")) )

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_34
formulas.expression:
AND( {!$Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE}, {!$Record.IsWon}, ISCHANGED({!$Record.IsWon}), CONTAINS({!$Record.Opp_Product_Lines__c},"Cloud"), OR( ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Customer") , ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type},"Cancellation - Product"))
)

formulas.name: formula_TRUE_myRule_42
formulas.expression: AND( {!$Record.Concession_Amount__c < 0}, ISPICKVAL({!$Record.Type}, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase"), {!$Record.IsClosed = FALSE })

formulas.name: OPP017EFxx_Formula
formulas.expression: AND( $Record.Exclude_from_Notifications__c=FALSE, $Record.IsClosed=FALSE, $Record.Maintenance_Amount__c < 0, $Record.Ant_Can_Sent__c=FALSE, $Record.Record_Type_Text__c ="Legal - Cancellation / Recurring Downgrade", NOT(ISPICKVAL($Record.Type, "Legal - Recurring Adjustment")), NOT(ISPICKVAL($Record.Type, "Legal - CPI / Recurring Increase")) )
